::Zardus::

Zardus frowns, wondering whether Lady Hawk was saying that she 
wouldn't do it. He leans forward.

"The result will be anything but uncontrollable," he says to 
her, "But are you saying that you won't make it? It does, after all, 
garauntee your freedom."




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> 
> 
>  >
> > "The creatures that Magmatron created were very good fighters,"
> > Zardus replies, "This is kind of an experiment."
> 
> Lady Hawk checked the facts, there was no doubt about the qualities 
of these
> creatures in a fight. The ones she'd known were savage ferocious 
beasts with
> insect like skin that made them difficult to kill. "My technology 
was meant
> for science, exploration, and colinization purposes, not to create 
an
> uncontrollable killer." She could tell that Zardus' attention wasn't
> entirely on her. she wished she could transform to her half mode so 
she
> could use her third eye to see what he was doing.
> 
> > "Yes, there'll be security," Zardus says to Lady Hawk after ending
> > the transmission to Mortem. "If the bot is uncontrollable it'll 
have
> > to be redone. Once you're successful, you'll be free to go."
> 
> This was the best offer she had heard yet. She wanted away from 
this group.
> so far she'd been wrapped up by one member(Najah) and shot at by 
another
> (Gotron). If these bots were supposed to be on her side then she 
hated to
> think what they'd do to thier enemies. "I'm sure we can find a 
comprimise."
> She says willing to do almost anything to get out of there.
